actionDecl.name: LdpStopKeepAlives
actionDecl.label: Stop Keepalives
actionDecl.tooltip: Stop sending keepalives for the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Stop sending keepalives for the selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpResumeKeepAlives
actionDecl.label: Resume Keepalives
actionDecl.tooltip: Resume sending keepalives for selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Resume sending keepalives for selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpStopHellos
actionDecl.label: Stop Hellos
actionDecl.tooltip: Stop sending hellos for the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Stop sending hellos for the selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpResumeHellos
actionDecl.label: Resume Hellos
actionDecl.tooltip: Resume sending hellos for the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Resume sending hellos for the selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpRestartRouter
actionDecl.label: Restart Router
actionDecl.tooltip: Perform a graceful restart for the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Perform a graceful restart for the selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpRequestLabel
actionDecl.label: Request Label
actionDecl.tooltip: Request Label for selected ingress LSPs.
actionDecl.description: Request Label for selected ingress LSPs.

actionDecl.name: LdpAbortRequest
actionDecl.label: Abort Request
actionDecl.tooltip: Abort outstanding requests for selected ingress LSPs.
actionDecl.description: Abort outstanding requests for selected ingress LSPs.

actionDecl.name: LdpPseudowireStatusNotification
actionDecl.label: Send Status Notification on Pseudowires
actionDecl.tooltip: Send status notifications on selected pseudowire LSPs.
actionDecl.description: Send status notifications on selected pseudowire LSPs.

actionDecl.name: LdpWithdrawPseudowireGroup
actionDecl.label: Withdraw Pseudowire Groups
actionDecl.tooltip: Perform a wildcard withdraw of pseudowire groups on the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Perform a wildcard withdraw of pseudowire groups on the selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpReadvertisePseudowireGroup
actionDecl.label: Readvertise Pseudowire Groups
actionDecl.tooltip: Readvertise configured pseudowires belonging to the specified groups on the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Readvertise configured pseudowires belonging to the specified groups on the selected LDP routers.

actionDecl.name: LdpPseudowireGroupStatusNotification
actionDecl.label: Send Status Notification on Pseudowire Groups
actionDecl.tooltip: Send status notification on the specified pseudowire groups on the selected LDP routers.
actionDecl.description: Send status notification on the specified pseudowire groups on the selected LDP routers.
